content.html: Hey BGR dot com, I want you to find the contributor who wrote this article and give me their name, so I can personally ask them how long they waited for a chance to make a joke like this and how good it felt to be given that chance.
content.value: Hey BGR dot com, I want you to find the contributor who wrote this article and give me their name, so I can personally ask them how long they waited for a chance to make a joke like this and how good it felt to be given that chance.
